MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 27-MAR-2021 00:34.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power fault in the LL61 postcode area of Llanfair PG affecting properties in Ffordd Rhiannon and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:06PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 12:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:57PM on 26th March 2021
